==Details==
===Description=== The Magmarizer costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Survival Area]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Magmar || | Magmortar |}
